title: A1534 820-00244
message:
Hi, i have an A1534 820-00244, that had liquid contact, and someone had submitted it to ultra-sound bath, but now it has no backlight.

In PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT (8500) I have 35V, and i can see an image on the LCD. 

I don't have a known good lcd to test it.

Can you help? What should i check from here?

title: A1534 820-00244
message:
35V doesn't look too high, nor low.
But not sure the correct voltage there; compare with good machine.

Testing known good LCD assembly is the safest way...

title: A1534 820-00244
message:
Hi, i managed to get a gook lcd and the laptop is booting normal, and has image, but i cant get an image on external monitor.

Any ideas?

title: A1534 820-00244
message:
Try another USB-C to HDMI adapter.
External USB device recognized?
